response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique offering is not just a product; it's an experience that embodies excellence and innovation. Given its exceptional quality and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, I believe it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering its true value, I am extending this opportunity to acquire it for $15,000. I trust that you will appreciate its worth and find it a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 15000}
